docna.cdata!:
Haiti - Third Power Project : Credit 1281 -
            Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Haiti - Third Power Project :
            Credit 1281 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Haiti - Third Power Project : Credit 1281 -
            Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Haiti - Third Power Project :
            Credit 1281 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would help to further
            develop the energy sector of Haiti through: (i) the
            construction of a diesel power station at Port-au-Prince
            with two diesel electric units; (ii) rehabilitation of the
            distribution network of Port-au-Prince; (iii) construction
            of a head office for EdH; (iv) repair of hydro-mechanical
            and civil works at the Peligre hydropower station; (v)
            surveys, feasibility study and preparation of bid documents
            for the Guayamouc I hydropower project; (vi) staff training;
            (vii) consulting services for management and operation of
            EdH, as well as for project implementation and supervision.
